incident_updates.body: The maintenance has been postponed and has been successfully rescheduled. As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud. Start time : 20/06/2024 04:05 UTC End time : 20/06/2024 07:30 UTC Service impact : You may experience micro cuts during maintenance. Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are going to update the server to a newer and more stable version.

scheduled_maintenances.name: [Global][Hosted Private Cloud] - VMware vCenter Server + Hosts upgrade

incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer. Start time : 24/06/2024 06:00 UTC End time : 28/06/2024 16:00 UTC Service impact : Management unavailable for 1h and all hosts will be put in maintenance (Vmotion). Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for hosts and vCenter Server services . An individual communication will be sent before the upgrade begins. Thank you for your understanding.

incident_updates.body: As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our infrastructure. This may temporarily affect availability. Start time : 03/07/2024 07:00 UTC End time : 03/07/2024 15:00 UTC Service impact : The backup and restore service will unreachable during this maintenance. incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer. Start time : 17/06/2024 08:00 UTC End time : 21/06/2024 16:00 UTC Service impact : Some call apiv6 & ovhplugins won't be functional during the maintenance Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out a replacement of our vScope backend. This maintenance will be rolled out in several zones. First wave will be on Monday 17/06/2024 on BHS1A / GRA2A and WAW1C and will be carried out after zone by zone. Thank you for your understanding.
